chapters.title: Chapter 9: Blood in the Air
chapters.info: Gorderan, p. 161—One of Mat's Redarms. He is good with a sword. He is built like the average blacksmith. He is from Tear, and has gray eyes. He shares a tent with Harnan, Metwyn, and Fergin. He was killed when the gholam attacked Mat's camp. He and Fergin tried to use pikes against him, not realizing that the gholam could easily squeeze between them.
